name: BowMage
description: The Skeleton King approaches! Take up your bow and defend the castle from wave after wave of the Skeleton King's relentless minions! In BowMage you are an archer tasked to defend the castle from skeleton invaders. Waves of enemies will attack and you must use skill and tactics to survive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 3.3 GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 970
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 3.4 GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11
